official_title: To promote portability of health insurance by limiting discrimination in health coverage based on health status or past claims experience.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Health Insurance Equity Act of 1994 - Amends the Social Security Act to add a new title XXI (Standards for Health Coverage) prohibiting discrimination in health insurance coverage, benefits, and premiums based on health status or claims experience, except with regard to certain preexisting conditions. Limits the conditions under which an insurer may refuse to renew the coverage of individuals or small employers. Authorizes appropriations for State enforcement programs.

titles.title: To promote portability of health insurance by limiting discrimination in health coverage based on health status or past claims experience.
